description: Details required for Condition 5 (Secure By Design Certificate) of planning permission 22/02196/CREG3 (Application under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 to carry out development without compliance with Condition 1 (Approved Plans) of Planning Permission ref: 20/02213/CREG3 (Partial demolition of the existing Roupell House building and erection of a part 3-storey, part 4-storey building comprising 23 residential units with associated landscaping, refuse and cycle storage, public pathway improvements to the eastern boundary and landscaping improvements to the existing communal amenity space to the rear of 37-40 York Road (Dale Court)) dated 15/03/2021. Variations to include internal reconfiguration, alterations to the approved bin and cycle store, alterations to fenestration and rainwater goods and reconfiguration of the north elevation.)
